Interface AdaptiveStrategy

All Superinterfaces:
AuctionEventListener, java.lang.Cloneable, Prototypeable, Resetable, Strategy
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdaptiveStrategyImpl, DiscreteLearnerStrategy, MDPStrategy, MomentumStrategy, PriestVanTolStrategy, SimpleMomentumStrategy, StimuliResponseStrategy, ZIPStrategy
public interface AdaptiveStrategy
extends Strategy

Strategies implementing this interface indicate that they are based on a learning algorithm.
